Wide sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and small slits at the sides of the hem. Longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Set with two pairs of earrings and three rings in metal. One pair of earrings and one ring are decorated with plastic beads.
Clip earrings in hammered metal with large, tear-shaped plastic beads. Length 8.5 cm.
Metal earrings. One pair in the shape of a pair of eyes with tear-shaped plastic beads, and the other pair in the shape of lips. Length 5 cm and 3 cm.

Gently fitted, knee-length coat in a jacquard-weave wool blend with notch lapels and buttons down the front. Welt front pockets with a flap, long sleeves with buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.

Straight-cut coat woven in a wool blend with wide lapels and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Pockets in the side seams and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined.
Wide, ankle-length, pattern-weave trousers with a high waist, detachable tie belt, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and side pockets.
Metal rings in various designs, four of which are decorated with a plastic stone.

Single-breasted jacket in a jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Peak lapels, a chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. Fastening with one covered button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
